channel.title: Firearm on Bulletin
channel.description: Recent content in Firearm on Bulletin

item.title: Prospect First Gun
item.description: Beretta M9 The Beretta M9 comes in 9mm and 22LR variant. Starting off with the 22LR would be cheap for training and easy for introducing the family to guns. Girsan Regard Cheap Beretta M9 clone. PTR 9CT Relatively cheap American MP5 clone.
